content.html: CircleCI was compromised over the holidays. I've been investigating the use of a @ThinkstCanary AWS token that was improperly accessed on December 27th and suspected as much. Now we have confirmation from the vendor.
content.value: CircleCI was compromised over the holidays. I've been investigating the use of a @ThinkstCanary AWS token that was improperly accessed on December 27th and suspected as much. Now we have confirmation from the vendor.
